name: Remove Low Coverage Fields
description: Given a dataset and a percent threshold value, this script removes all fields with counts less than that threshold.

inputs.name: dataset
inputs.description: The dataset that contains low-coverage fields

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.description: The threshold value either as an integer (e.g. permit no more than 100 missing values) or a percent (e.g. permit no less than 10% coverage)
